name: Yanone kaffeesatz
summary: Font in four weights, reminiscent of 1920s coffee house typography
description: Yanone Kaffeesatz was first published in 2004. Its Bold is reminiscent of 1920s coffee house typography, while the rather thin fonts bridge the gap to present times. You can witness Kaffeesatz use on German fresh-water gyms, Dubai mall promos and New Zealand McDonalds ads. And of course on coffee and foodstuff packaging and cafe design around the globe. . In 2010 it was decided to be re-released under the SIL Open Font License to make it possible to include in software bundles or web font services like Googles Font Directory.
